permissions: User must be authorized to update the associated driver day (via DriverDayConstraintPolicy, which delegates to the driver day update permission).
side_effects: Updates the specified driver day constraint.
validation_notes: driver-day cannot be changed after creation. At least one updatable attribute is required (constraint). Constraint can be cleared by passing an empty string.

flags.name: --constraint
flags.description: Shift set time card constraint ID (use empty to clear)
